name: FA - Easier to See Rating Borders
description: The current iteration of FA provides some subtle glowing effects.  On larger screens these colors appear dull-ish at times, and don't show up nicely, more specifically against the dark background.  Put together on a whim, this makes those borders bold, thick, brighter and easier to see.
additional_info:
Version 1 Released
- Basic borders added.
- Crude new selection box added - solid white 1px box.
- Altered the color of the mature border.
- A a known bug is with the preview pane on user profiles where the username also gains the border.
- A known but is with the selection box - borders are removed from the image, replaced with the old glow effect.  I can't quite figure out what it is that's altering this.
- The current sizes of the elements result in some moving around depending on what image is hovered over.

Color Reference:
Red = Adult
Blue = Mature
Black = General Audiences

Thin white BG - currently selected box (It's ugly but I couldn't figure out what would look nicer than the current selection box :/

No special instructions are needed - just start it up and let 'em rip!
